title: Shadow DOM
subtext: Encapsulated DOM and styling for web components
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Shadow DOM
texts: Shadow DOM is a web standard that enables encapsulation of DOM and CSS in web components, allowing developers to isolate styles and markup from the main document.
This means that styles defined inside a shadow DOM do not leak out, and external styles do not penetrate the shadow DOM, ensuring modular and maintainable code.
